subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Ruud Gullit, once one of the best players in the world, has been hired to coach the Los Angeles Galaxy. Gullit, a 45-year-old Dutchman, will succeed Frank Yallop, who quit as coach of the David Beckham-led Galaxy on Monday to return to San Jose for a second stint with the Earthquakes. Gullit, born in Amsterdam, was a star striker on the standout Dutch national team that won the 1988 European Championship. He has spent the past two years as a television analyst.
